alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued May 08 at 11:55PM MDT until May 10 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 possible. * WHERE...Cache Valley/Utah Portion and Eastern Box Elder County. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County
